title: What are the rules for IAP returns in the [Marching Test]?
content:
For all players participating in the AstrArk Marching Test, any purchases of the following in-game items during the test will be counted toward the total IAP amount:
Your total recharge amount will be returned to your MOONVEIL account after the official game launch according to the IAP Return Rules.

title: What payment methods are supported during the [Marching Test]?
content: During the test, players can log into the game via Android or Apple devices to make in-game purchases. Additionally, players can use special WEB3 payment methods to receive extra discounts on item purchases. Please use the official Android and Apple payment channels, as well as the exclusive WEB3 payment channels, for transactions.

title: Will my IAP data be shared across different platforms?
content: During the [Marching Test], all in-game content purchased under the same MOONVEIL account will be fully interoperable across platforms.

title: What should I do if I don’t receive the purchased items after completing the payment?
content: Please be patient. If you still haven’t received the items after relogging, you can join the official DISCORD community to inquire. We have a dedicated team to follow up on such issues. Official Discord link: https://discord.com/invite/moonveil.

title: I made a payment during the [Marching Test]. When can I receive the recharge return items?
content: After the official launch of AstrArk, the recharge return items from the [Marching Test] will be delivered via in-game mail. Players can log into the game using the same MOONVEIL account they used during the [Marching Test] and claim the return items through the Mail feature. Please note that the return mail must be claimed within 30 days; after this period, it will automatically expire.

title: Where can I check my recharge records during the [Marching Test]?
content: During and after the [Marching Test], players can check their total recharge amount and the estimated return items through a dedicated page on the MOONVEIL official website. For more details, please visit: XXX.

title: The data on the recharge return query page doesn't match my actual recharge amount. What should I do?
content: If you have any questions about your recharge amount, you can join the official DISCORD community for assistance. Official Discord link: https://discord.com/invite/moonveil.

title: After the official launch, can I use a different account to claim the IAP return items from the [Marching Test]?
content: No, IAP return items cannot be claimed with a different account and cannot be transferred to other accounts.

title: After the official launch, can I use devices from different platforms to claim the recharge return items?
content: Yes, within the same MOONVEIL account system, players can claim the return items as long as they log in with the same MOONVEIL account used during the [Marching Test], even if switch devices.
